entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
